name: Don't Block the Box!
overview: Gameplay: - Control the traffic to allow cars to safely cross the intersection. - The faster cars exit the screen, the more points are scored. - If cars are stopped for too long or stop inside the intersection, your score will reduce quickly. - If any cars crash, it's game over! Controls: - Joystick in Port 2 (arrow keys). - Left to stop and restart traffic in eastbound lane - Right for westbound - Up for southbound - Down for northbound - Fire to restart game Written over a couple of evenings for the C64 Cassette 50 Competition using 6502 assembly in KickAssembler, with all code and data to be below $1000.
